title: I swear to fucking god if I see one more ADC build relic shield, I'm going to lose my shit.
body:
Like read the fucking patch notes.

https://image.prntscr.com/image/kCicdVyfSD2WMtlXoBcEZA.png

"This jinx so op early wtf" as he builds a fucking relic shield when it hardly even fucking works with Ranged champions anymore.

On a side note, my team was blaming me for this loss when I was placed down 11 wards, ganked numerous times, and counter jungled where need be. I love losing in champion select, real fucking blast.

replies.body:
Support items actually SHOULD be picked up by all champs given their current gold value spike. Gold for missed minions/secure, + 3 wards for 800g is worth more than any other item in the game. On an adc, gives them Bandit for gold, and it's not hard to charge a {{item:3302}} or {{item:3096}} . They've basically become a {{item:1083}} for all characters that also has 3 wards. If you need their slot late game to finish a build, you will have already farmed enough gold to make it worth it.

P.S. Why did you Tier 3 your support item? Now THAT is worthless.
It is getting nerfed for ranged, or possibly already did(?)

I recommend you remake this post, as it does have some valuable information
The picture is fine, but this is the place to inform players not to build it, not rage at your teammates who did build it
